item.title: 四月狂飙之后，股市无视特朗普的贸易战
item.description: 股票投资者开始淡忘唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战。【原文：Stock investors are starting to tune out President Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 赞比亚停止加息，原因是玉米种植热潮导致通胀降温
item.description: 赞比亚中央银行维持关键利率不变，因为它预计通货紧缩进程将继续下去。【原文：Zambia’s central bank held its key interest rate as it expects the disinflation process to continue.】

item.title: 欧元区工资增长下滑，支持欧洲央行进一步宽松
item.description: 衡量欧元区薪资增长的一项关键指标大幅下滑，支持了欧洲中央银行关于通胀将很快达到2%目标的说法，也支持了进一步降低利率的呼吁。【原文：A key measure of euro-area pay growth plunged, supporting the European Central Bank’s claim that inflation will soon hit the 2% target and backing calls to lower interest rates further.】

item.title: 调查显示瑞典央行下月将降息
item.description: 彭博社对经济学家的调查显示，瑞典央行在上次会议上发出了略微宽松的信号，下个月可能会将瑞典借贷成本下调四分之一个百分点，这与市场定价形成了鲜明对比。【原文：The Riksbank, which signaled a slight easing bias at its last meeting, will probably deliver a quarter-point reduction in Swedish borrowing costs already next month, according to a survey of economists by Bloomberg that contrasts with market pricing.】

item.title: 南非计划通过法律手段为 "星链 "铺平道路
item.description: 南非政府提出了一项对黑人所有权要求的变通办法，这将为 Starlink 和其他卫星服务在该国的运营铺平道路。【原文：South Africa’s government is proposing a workaround to Black ownership requirements that will pave the way for Starlink and other satellite services to operate in the country.】

item.title: 瑞士信贷奖金裁决遭瑞士政府向最高法院提出质疑
item.description: 瑞士财政部对一项裁决提出上诉，该裁决称，在瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）收购其倒闭的竞争对手时，十几名前瑞士信贷银行家的奖金被非法剥夺，这为政府与一众顶级银行家之间可能在瑞士最高法庭上摊牌埋下了伏笔。【原文：The Swiss finance ministry appealed a ruling that a dozen ex-Credit Suisse bankers were unlawfully stripped of their bonuses when UBS Group AG bought its collapsing rival, setting up a potential showdown in the country’s highest tribunal between the government and a cadre of top bankers.】

item.title: 波兰股市飙升面临决胜选举的考验
item.description: 波兰股市是今年全球股市中的佼佼者之一，它的暴跌表明，交易商对更多的政治意外越来越感到不安。【原文：The slump in Polish stocks, one of the year’s global equity standouts, signals that traders are increasingly jittery about any more political surprises.】

item.title: 新加坡金管局称局长并未说美元资产不可替代
item.description: 新加坡央行表示，周期性和结构性因素都会影响美元资产的定价和信心，并补充说，其常务董事本周早些时候并没有说美元资产是不可替代的。【原文：Singapore’s central bank said both cyclical and structural factors can affect the pricing and confidence in US dollar assets, adding that its managing director didn’t say earlier this week that dollar assets are irreplaceable.】

item.title: 可能成为纽约市新市长的社会主义者佐赫兰-马姆达尼
item.description:
房租冻结、城市经营的杂货店和更多的清真餐车。【原文：

Rent freezes, city-run grocery stores, and more Halal carts.

】

item.title: 可能成为纽约市新市长的社会主义者佐赫兰-马姆达尼
item.description: 距离竞争激烈的纽约市市长民主党初选只有一个月了。候选人之一、皇后区议员佐赫兰-马姆达尼（Zohran Mamdani）的竞选纲领有些不同寻常。在美国民主社会党的支持下，他提出了冻结房租、普及儿童保育、提高对企业和富人的税收、免费公交车和城市经营的杂货店等主张。在本期对话中，我们将与这位未来的市长谈谈他对纽约的社会主义愿景，包括他如何计划【原文：We’re just a month away from the hotly-contested Democratic primary for New York City Mayor. And one of the candidates — Queens assemblyman Zohran Mamdani — is running on a somewhat unusual platform. Endorsed by the Democratic Socialists of America, he’s proposing rent freezes, universal childcare, higher taxes on corporations and the wealthy, free buses, and city-run grocery stores. In this conversation, we talk to the would-be mayor about his socialist vision for New York, including how he pla】

item.title: 德意志银行计划与 30 亿美元企业贷款相关的 SRT 交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）正在出售一项与 30 亿美元企业贷款组合相关的重大风险转移交易，这是今年推动该市场交易量创历史新高的最新交易。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG is selling a significant risk transfer linked to a portfolio of $3 billion in corporate loans, according to people with knowledge of the matter, the latest deal to drive this market toward record volumes this year.】

item.title: 汇丰银行调查显示：美国企业面临特朗普关税的最大冲击
item.description: 根据汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的一项调查，美国企业最担心唐纳德-特朗普总统不断变化的关税政策对其收入的影响，超过半数的企业预计其收入将受到至少 25% 的冲击。【原文：US businesses are the most worried about the impact of President Donald Trump’s shifting tariff policies on their revenues, with more than half projecting a hit of at least 25% to their revenue, according to a survey by HSBC Holdings Plc.】

item.title: 欧盟将把银行交易平台的资本规定推迟一年
item.description: 欧盟决定推迟对银行交易业务实施更严格的资本要求，因为欧盟担心该行业的竞争力。【原文：The European Union has decided to delay the application of tougher capital requirements for banks’ trading businesses as the bloc is concerned about the industry’s competitiveness.】

item.title: 匈牙利欧尔班发出信号：经济逆风可能持续到 2026 年
item.description: 匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）以邻国乌克兰的和平努力存在不确定性为由，表示启动国家经济的工作可能会进一步推迟到明年。【原文：Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban signaled potential further delays in kick-starting the nation’s economy into next year, citing the uncertainty around peace efforts in neighboring Ukraine.】

item.title: 中国 50 年期债券拍卖收益率自 2022 年以来首次上升
item.description: 在中国 50 年期主权债券拍卖中，由于政府的政策支持和美国贸易紧张局势的缓解，债务需求减少，该期限债券的收益率自 2022 年以来首次出现上升。【原文：China’s 50-year sovereign bond auction saw a yield increase for the tenor for the first time since 2022, as government policy support and easing US trade tensions reduced demand for debt.】

item.title: 日本最大人寿保险公司称未实现债券损失增加两倍
item.description: 日本最大的人寿保险公司称，在截至 3 月份的财政年度里，由于利率上升削弱了其投资组合的价值，该公司持有的国内债券的未实现损失增加了两倍多。【原文：Japan’s biggest life insurer said unrealized losses on its domestic bond holdings more than tripled in the fiscal year through March as rising interest rates undercut the value of its portfolio.】

item.title: 在关税问题上存在分歧之际，欧盟和美国将于周五举行贸易电话会议
item.description: 据欧盟委员会发言人称，欧盟贸易主管马罗斯-塞夫科维奇（Maros Sefcovic）计划于周五与美国贸易主管贾米森-格里尔（Jamieson Greer）通电话，评估会谈情况。【原文：The European Union’s trade chief, Maros Sefcovic, is planning to hold a call with Jamieson Greer, his US counterpart, on Friday to take stock of talks, according to a European Commission spokesperson.】

item.title: 据说亨索特正在探索出售南非光电部门
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，德国雷达制造商亨索特公司（Hensoldt AG）正在探索其南非光电业务的各种选择，包括可能的出售。【原文：German radar maker Hensoldt AG is exploring options for its South African optronics business, including a potential sale, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 意大利联合信贷银行将就意大利收购 BPM 的条件提起法律诉讼
item.description: UniCredit SpA 发表声明称，计划向意大利行政法院提出索赔，以评估政府对其竞购 Banco BPM SpA 所施加的条件。【原文：UniCredit SpA plans to file a claim with Italy’s administrative court to assess the conditions imposed by the government on its bid for Banco BPM SpA, according to a statement.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长斯托纳拉斯预计 6 月降息，然后暂停：卡西姆里尼报
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）和奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）预计，中央银行将在 6 月份进一步降低利率。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council members Yannis Stournaras and Olli Rehn anticipate a further reduction in the central lender’s rates in June.】

item.title: 德国年初经济增长超出预期
item.description: 2025 年初，由于消费者和企业增加了支出，贸易在美国关税的预期下激增，德国的经济增长是最初估计的两倍。【原文：Germany’s economy grew twice as much as initially estimated at the start of 2025 as consumers and businesses increased spending and trade surged in anticipation of US tariffs.】

item.title: 刚果参议院取消前领导人卡比拉的起诉豁免权
item.description: 刚果民主共和国参议院取消了对前总统约瑟夫-卡比拉的起诉豁免权，因为有人指控他支持该国东部的武装叛乱。【原文：Democratic Republic of Congo’s Senate lifted former President Joseph Kabila’s immunity from prosecution amid allegations he’s supporting an armed rebellion in the east of the country.】

item.title: 英国零售业销售额飙升表明消费者恢复力强
item.description: 英国 4 月份的零售销售额大幅增长，延续了今年以来出人意料的强劲势头，这进一步表明消费者在面对不断上涨的账单和唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的全球贸易战时表现出了顽强的生命力。【原文：UK retail sales soared in April, continuing a surprisingly strong start to the year in a further sign that consumers are proving resilient in the face of rising bills and Donald Trump’s global trade war.】

item.title: 英国能源账单将下降 7%，为家庭减负
item.description: 在天然气批发价格下跌之后，英国的能源账单将从 7 月份开始下降 7%，这为仍在高成本中挣扎的家庭和企业提供了一些宽慰。【原文：UK energy bills will fall 7% from July after a dip in wholesale gas prices, providing some relief to households and businesses who are still struggling with high costs.】

item.title: 阿联酋人工智能大学立志成为海湾地区的斯坦福大学
item.description:
穆罕默德-本-扎耶德人工智能大学致力于打造工程技术人才梯队，孵化本土初创企业，推动该地区的人工智能发展

。【原文：

Mohamed bin Zayed University of AI is focused on building an engineering pipeline, incubating homegrown startups, and hypercharging the region’s AI development

】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：零售销售超预期，能源价格上限下降
澳大利亚太平洋液化天然气公司在中石化大规模供应协议中降低价格
item.description: 澳大利亚太平洋液化天然气公司（Australia Pacific LNG）同意下调根据与中国中石化（Sinopec）签订的主要合同出售的液化天然气的价格。【原文：Australia Pacific LNG agreed to cut the price of liquefied natural gas sold under a major contract with China’s Sinopec.】

item.title: 印度央行行长认为印度经济增长因关税问题受到适度冲击
item.description: 印度央行行长表示，印度的经济增长将受到当前关税紧张局势的短期影响，但这个南亚国家将在地缘政治和贸易不确定性中保持韧性。【原文：India’s economic growth will see a short-term impact of the ongoing tariff tensions, the central bank governor said, though the South Asian nation will stay resilient amid geopolitical and trade uncertainties.】

item.title: 中国企业在香港的首次亮相激发了估值转变的希望
item.description: 本周两家主要港股上市公司业绩强劲，这让人们希望，一小部分中国精英公司可能会开始推动香港股市转变，结束香港股市对内地市场的历史性折让。【原文：The robust performance of two major Hong Kong stock listings this week has raised hopes that a small group of elite Chinese companies may start driving a shift to end the city’s historical discount to mainland markets.】

item.title: 印度与美国收益率差距创 20 年新低，引发基金外流担忧
item.description: 印度债券收益率对美国的溢价已降至二十年来最低，这可能会导致资金从地方债务中流出。【原文：India’s bond yield premium over the US has narrowed to its smallest in two decades, likely risking fund outflows from local debt.】
